title: Power fault causing delays on Circle Line

updates.text: [CCL] CLEARED: Train services between #Bayfront and #MarinaBay are now running normally.
[CCL] CLEARED: Train services from #Serangoon towards #HarbourFront are now operating normally.
[CCL]: Estimate 15 mins additional travelling time between #Bayfront and #MarinaBay in both directions. We are recovering the service now.
[CCL]UPDATE: Fault is cleared. Expect longer travelling time from #Serangoon towards #HarbourFront. Trains and platforms are crowded.
[CCL]: Estimate 10 mins additional travelling time from #Serangoon to #BuonaVista towards #HarbourFront due to power fault.
